statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, contribution_date FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE duration_hours > 5;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, duration_hours FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE impact_points > 50 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name AS name, impact_points * 2 AS total_points FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE duration_hours < 3;
SELECT MAX(impact_points) AS max_points FROM volunteer_contributions;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE duration_hours > 5 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC, impact_points ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT volunteer_name, SUM(duration_hours) AS total_duration FROM volunteer_contributions GROUP BY volunteer_name HAVING total_duration > 20
SELECT volunteer_name, DATE_FORMAT(contribution_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE impact_points > 50
SELECT volunteer_name, CONCAT('Volunteer - ', volunteer_name) AS role FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE impact_points > 100 ORDER BY volunteer_name

SELECT volunteer_id, DATEDIFF(NOW(), contribution_date) AS days_since_contribution FROM volunteer_contributions WHERE duration_hours < 2 GROUP BY volunteer_id ORDER BY days_since_contribution DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM VolunteerContributions WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_id, contribution_description FROM VolunteerContributions WHERE contribution_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM ImpactData WHERE impact_type = 'Donation' ORDER BY impact_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(impact_id) AS total_impacts FROM ImpactData GROUP BY volunteer_id HAVING total_impacts > 3;
SELECT * FROM ImpactData WHERE impact_description LIKE '%community%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerContributions WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT contribution_date, contribution_description FROM VolunteerContributions WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_id, contribution_date, contribution_description FROM VolunteerContributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, contribution_date, contribution_description FROM VolunteerContributions WHERE contribution_description LIKE '%food%';
SELECT v.volunteer_id, v.contribution_date, v.contribution_description, i.impact_type, i.impact_description FROM VolunteerContributions v INNER JOIN ImpactData i ON v.volunteer_id = i.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email, address FROM volunteers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT contribution_id, contribution_date, hours_spent FROM contributions WHERE hours_spent > 5;
SELECT * FROM impact_data WHERE impact_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM volunteers WHERE address='123 Main St';
SELECT contribution_id, contribution_date, hours_spent FROM contributions WHERE hours_spent > 5;

SELECT vd.volunteer_id, v.name, c.contribution_date, c.hours_spent, id.impact_description FROM volunteers v, contributions c, impact_data id WHERE v.volunteer_id = c.volunteer_id AND c.contribution_id = id.contribution_id;

SELECT v.name AS volunteer_name, c.contribution_date AS date, id.impact_description AS impact_desc, id.impact_rating AS rating FROM volunteers v INNER JOIN contributions c ON v.volunteer_id = c.volunteer_id INNER JOIN impact_data id ON c.contribution_id = id.contribution_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT contribution_id, date, amount FROM Contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT service_name, category FROM CommunityService WHERE category = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM ImpactData ORDER BY date DESC, value ASC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, location FROM Volunteers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT c.date, v.name, i.metric, i.value FROM Contributions c JOIN Volunteers v ON c.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN ImpactData i ON c.contribution_id = i.contribution_id WHERE c.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Contributions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT s.service_name, s.category, v.name FROM CommunityService s JOIN Volunteers v ON s.service_id = v.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer
SELECT name, age FROM Volunteer WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Contribution ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT description, date FROM Contribution WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT org_name, address FROM Organization
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE volunteer_id = 3
SELECT org_name, website, contact_email FROM Organization WHERE org_id = 1
SELECT impact_description, impact_date FROM Impact WHERE contribution_id = 5
SELECT activity_name, location FROM Activity WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
